name: KJ-52
description: '''Jonah Kirsten Sorrentino''' (born June 26, 1975), better known by his stage name '''KJ-52''', is a [[Christian hip hop|Christian rapper]] from [[Tampa, Florida]]. He was awarded the Rap/Hip Hop Recorded Song of the Year for "Never Look Away" and Rap/Hip Hop Album of the Year at the GMA Dove Awards of 2007. On July 28, 2009, KJ-52 released "End of My Rope", which is the first single for his album ''Five-Two Television''.
